paper_abstract: The SOCS project (A computational logic model for the description, analysis and verification of global and open SOcieties of heterogeneous ComputeeS), funded by the European Commission under the Fifth Framework, Future and Emerging Technologies programme, has been one of the main sponsors of CLIMA VI. This short article outlines the project's main challenges and its main outcomes.
paper_title: Multi-agent systems in computational logic: Challenges and outcomes of the SOCS project
